pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President Trần Đại Quang of Vietnam | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the President of Vietnam, Trần Đại Quang, on the margins of APEC. 

The two leaders welcomed the growing cooperation between the two countries and discussed ways to expand it, as well as build on strong people-to-people ties, including through joint education and training initiatives. They had a productive discussion about bilateral, regional and global issues of common interest, including trade and investment, development cooperation and climate change.
